<h>
- Upgrade and Update by :
<p>
â² sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y
</p>
- Install Ffmpeg by :
<p>
â² sudo apt-get install python3-pip ffmpeg -y
</p>
- Install required packages by :
<p>
â² sudo apt-get install python3-pip -y
</p>
- Install pip by :
<p>
â² sudo pip3 install -U pip
</p>
- Install Node js by :
<p>
â² curl -fssL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_19.x | sudo -E bash - && sudo apt-get install nodejs -y && npm i -g npm
</p>
- Clone the repository by :
<p>
â² git clone https://github.com/vicky0604hello/DCxMUSIC && cd DCxMUSIC
</p>
- Install requirements by :
<p>
â² pip3 install -U -r requirements.txt
</p>
- Fill your variables in the env by :
<p>
â² vi sample.env <br>
</p>
Press `I` on the keyboard for editing env<br>
<p>
â² Press `Ctrl+C` when you're done with editing env and `:wq` to save the env<br>
</p>
- Rename the env file by :
<p>
â² mv sample.env .env
</p>
- Install tmux to keep running your bot when you close the terminal by :
<p>
â² sudo apt install tmux && tmux
</p>
- Finally run the bot by :
<p>
â² bash start
</p>
- For getting out from tmux session : 
<p>
 â² Press `Ctrl+b` and then `d`<br>
</p>
